alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 15 at 3:05AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Alabama and northwest Florida, including the following areas, in southwest Alabama, Baldwin Central, Baldwin Coastal, Mobile Central, Mobile Coastal and Mobile Inland. In northwest Florida, Escambia Coastal, Okaloosa Coastal and Santa Rosa Coastal. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, roadways, urban areas, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and thunderstorms will increase in coverage across coastal portions of southwest Alabama and the western Florida panhandle this morning, with additional rounds of showers and storms possible through the afternoon and evening hours. Very heavy rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches with localized totals in excess of 6 inches will be possible through this evening, which could result in flash flooding.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland
